analysis.description:
Ottolotto.distributeFunds (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#431-451) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- partner[_player].transfer(toPartner) (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#440-442)
	- _player.transfer(weiWin - toOwner) (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#444-445)
	- owner.transfer(toOwner - toPartner) (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#445-448)

Reentrancy in Ottolotto.finishChampionGame (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol):
	External calls:
	- currentGame = champion.currentGameBlockNumber() (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol)
	- winner = champion.finishCurrentGame() (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol)
	- champion.setGamePrize(currentGame,jackpot) (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol)
	External calls sending eth:
	- winner.transfer(jackpot - jackpot.div(5)) (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol)
	- owner.transfer(jackpot.div(5)) (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- jackpot (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol)

Ottolotto.gameIsOver (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#354-362) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- gameStartBlock[_game] == 0

Ottolotto.gameIsOver (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#354-362) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- gameStartBlock[_game] == 0
Ottolotto.init (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#157-171) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(gameNext == 0)

Ottolotto.makeBet (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#273-301) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-champion.buyTicket(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#294-295)

Ottolotto.startChampionGame (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#505-512) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-champion.startGame() (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#506-508)

Reentrancy in Ottolotto.makeBet (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#273-301):
	External calls:
	- champion.buyTicket(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#294-295)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- partner (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#298-300)
	- partners (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#298-300)

Ottolotto.gameDuration should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#150-152)
Ottolotto.ticketPrice should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#153-154)
iChampion.currentGameBlockNumber should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#91-92)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/21/0x922bcf2a9bd398a3ca942bc66436d8c4de57b83d.sol#245:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
